title: Roome for a justice Or, The life and death of Justice Waterton : together with his epitaph. Presented to the view of the citizens of London, and the rest of the good people at Wapping, Ratcliffe, and St. Katherines. To the tune of A Sunday bak'd pudding.
notes: Verse - "A justice that never could tell how to write,".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
